title: Julkalendern 2014 - Piratskattens hemlighet - episode 1-24
description:
Julkalendern 2014 - Piratskattens hemlighet
Episode 1-24



Standard ISO MPEG-4 container

Video AVC/H264 1280x720 25fps
Audio Swedish AAC LC Stereo 24kHz/48kHz SBR 96kbit
Text Swedish 3GPP/MPEG-4 Timed Text


Merry Christmas to you all!

Swedish subtitle track is marked as disabled so compliant video players shouldn't show it by default.

Still, if subtitles do bother you, you can simply get rid of them by removing the text stream from the MPEG-4 file.


Use mp4box from command prompt:


> mp4box -rem 3 "Piratskattens hemlighet 01.mp4"


If you need separate subtitle files you can simply extract them with:


> mp4box -srt 3 "Piratskattens hemlighet 01.mp4"


mp4box can be found here:
 <a href="
http://www.videohelp.com/tools/mp4box" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.videohelp.com/tools/mp4box</a>
